backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing the Powerpal fitness app backend with profile management, workout/meal plan generation, and role-based access control via MixinAuthorization and AccessControl mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the 'Your Workout Plan' banner background color change to green was implemented in WorkoutPlanView.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of all frontend source files, describing their purpose and key implementation details for the Powerpal fitness app.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes used by shadcn-ui components, with no custom app-specific styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Powerpal Vite/React app, mounting the React root and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that reads the localStorage profile and conditionally renders OnboardingFlow for new users or the appropriate view (workout, meal, schedule, goals, adaptive) for returning users.
frontend/src/components/AdaptiveLevelsVi: View component that lets users select a fitness level (beginner/intermediate/advanced) and applies it by saving the updated profile and regenerating the workout plan via localStorage-based hooks.
frontend/src/components/GoalDrivenPlansV: View component that lets users select a fitness goal and regenerates both workout and meal plans locally, featuring the PowerpalMascot and navigation to all other views.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen component shown to unauthenticated users, displaying the Powerpal branding and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/MealPlanView.tsx: Displays a personalized weekly meal plan with day-by-day navigation, allowing users to regenerate the plan and navigate to other app sections (Workout, Schedule, Goals, Levels).
frontend/src/components/OnboardingFlow.t: A 3-step onboarding wizard that collects user name, age, fitness level, and goal, then saves the profile and generates initial workout and meal plans.
frontend/src/components/PowerpalMascot.t: Renders an animated mascot image with a rotating speech bubble displaying context-specific motivational messages for home, onboarding, plan, and meal screens.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyScheduleVi: Shows a weekly workout schedule with expandable day details, completion tracking, and a progress counter, with options to regenerate the plan and navigate to other views.
Displays the user's generated workout plan with a banner, mascot, and per-day exercise details, plus a button to generate or regenerate the plan.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the user's Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for reading and writing profile, workout plan, and meal plan data to/from localStorage, with local plan generation utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks that interact with the ICP backend actor to fetch and mutate user profile, workout plan, and meal plan data.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Barlow fonts, configures Tailwind with OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for theming, and defines utility classes and keyframe animations for the athletic UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page component displaying a hero section with mascot, tagline, CTA buttons, and feature cards that route to different app sections based on whether the user has a profile.
frontend/src/utils/localStorage.ts: Utility module for persisting and retrieving profile, workout plan, and meal plan data in localStorage, with custom BigInt JSON serialization/deserialization support.
frontend/src/utils/planGenerator.ts: Generates weekly workout and meal plans based on a user's fitness goal (weight loss, muscle gain, endurance, etc.). Returns structured plan objects with exercises per day and goal-specific meal options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, defining custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, glow box shadows, and accordion animations, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state for the Powerpal fitness app, recording existing features, a pending feature request to change the 'Your Workout Plan' section background to green, and architectural metadata.
